amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 114-610 to give priority to protecting federal taxpayer assets in Puerto Rico, such as mass transportation assets.
amendment.purpose: Amendment ensures that Federally funded public transportation systems are considered an essential service as Puerto Rico works to address its debt issues.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Graves (MO) amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Graves (MO).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Graves (MO) amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
